The 3rd added layer could be made with a fill layer with a solid color.  This makes it much easier to adjust the color afterwards. Without  scientific proof I would say it take up less RAM since it's an instruction  layer rather than a pixel layer. Which definitely is an advantage when  working with high resolution images.
